column4: anyway know of any troubleshooting guides for booting ubuntu 7.10 live cd on a system with nvidia geforce fx5200 and intel integated graphics on the computer?
you got the onboa4rd video disabled in the bios?
it's an older pc and doesnt have an option to disable the onboard video.
double check the settings. there may be a 'default adaptor pci/agp/onbord' setting somewhere also.  Of rouce Not sure what your actual problem is
